title: France panorama. [No. 75/04]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Physics and the laboratory - the research equipment salon. Solar energy - a French solar pump in Mauritania. 2. Art and technique today - a modern plant. 3. The rich and varied provinces - the Lavaufrance Commandery. 4. French art in Iran - the Teheran autumn salon.
